result.reason: Issue title mentions reconnection problems but body is empty — cannot determine if this is a bug in the auto-reconnect timer (tmrReconnect_Tick in RdpProtocol.cs), the ReconnectGroup UI, or a general UX complaint; need reproduction steps and protocol type.
result.approach: Request repro steps: which protocol, what 'lost connection' means (timeout vs server drop), whether ReconnectGroup appears at all, and what happens when reconnect is attempted — then trace tmrReconnect_Tick / ExtendedReconnectTimer_Tick flow.
